response.overview: A sudden hospital fire reunites Cindy with her first love, Jackson, after eight long years. Now a heroic fire captain, Jackson risks his life to rescue a nurse trapped in the blaze—only to discover she's none other than Cindy, the woman who shattered his heart during a college break by seemingly cheating on him. As fate begins to turn its wheels, long-buried truths slowly surface. Cindy never betrayed him—instead, she chose to hide her pregnancy to protect Jackson’s future, raising their son Noah alone ever since. Now, facing the child who doesn’t know his true identity, Jackson’s paternal instincts awaken, while Cindy’s long-hidden maternal secret teeters on the edge of revelation. As the flames of their past reignite, they’re met with overwhelming obstacles: a jealous boss, a ruthless mother, sneering colleagues, and a kidnapping plot that pushes Cindy to the brink once more.
response.title: From Ashes To Us
